/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. The buildings, painted in shades of red and brown, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The trees, with their lush green foliage, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The street itself is devoid of any traffic or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
